tasks.task_description: Create project structure with Vite React TypeScript
Set up map interface with Leaflet centered on Cairns
Add geolocation and manual address entry functionality
Create mock GeoJSON data for First Nations boundaries
Implement boundary overlay on map with click handlers
Build health services page with mock data
Create resource request form with mock submission
Style for mobile responsiveness and optimize UX

description: Build a responsive mobile-first web app for First Nations health services mapping, centered on Cairns with geolocation, country boundaries, and health service listings
